resources.string: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time, W-2 employee)

Languages: Swift, Objective-C, Kotlin, Java 
Web: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript
Web services: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript
Frameworks: Flutter, Node.js
Platforms: iOS, Android, Web

Efficient iOS Developer with 9 years of professional experience driving project delivery by implementing optimal technologies, analyzing requirements and specifications, designing architecture, and establishing functional specifications in Agile / Scrum environment. Motivated team leader who mentors junior developers and performs code reviews to strengthen development process and increase customer satisfaction. Skilled in using technologies such as Objective-C, Swift, Git, MVC, MVVM, and Node.js.
